actorgroup.desc: What group can this actor stomp on?
actorgroup.name: _StompableGroup

control.desc: Select the key used to move to the right.
control.name: _MoveRightKey

control.desc: Select the key used to move to the left.
control.name: _MoveLeftKey

number.desc:
How fast should the Actor move?
(default = 15)
number.name: _Speed

control.desc: Select the key used for jumping.
control.name: _JumpKey

animation.desc: Animation used for jumping to the right.
animation.name: _JumpRightAnimation

animation.desc: Animation used for jumping to the left.
animation.name: _JumpLeftAnimation

snippet.desc: Attach to an actor to make the camera follow it. You can then specify the speed at which the camera should "scroll" towards the actor.
snippet.description: Attach to an actor to make the camera follow it. You can then specify the speed at which the camera should "scroll" towards the actor.
snippet.name: Camera Follow

number.desc: INTERNAL ATTRIBUTE: The x-position that the camera should be.
number.name: _intendedCameraX

number.desc: INTERNAL ATTRIBUTE: The y-position that the camera should be.
number.name: _intendedCameraY

number.desc: INTERNAL ATTRIBUTE: The current x-position of the camera.
number.name: _currentCameraX

number.desc: INTERNAL ATTRIBUTE: The current y-position of the camera.
number.name: _currentCameraY

number.desc: The speed, in pixels per frame, that the camera should scroll by following the actor. Leave as 0 to indicate an instant jump.
number.name: _ScrollSpeed

snippet.desc: Makes the actor move back and forth vertically.
snippet.description: Makes the actor move back and forth vertically.
snippet.name: Back and Forth Vertically

number.desc: The distance the actor will be moving up.
number.name: _DistanceUp

number.desc: The movement speed.
number.name: _Speed

number.desc: The direction in which the actor will be moving when created.
number.name: _InitialDirection

number.desc: The distance the actor will be moving down.
number.name: _DistanceDown

boolean.desc:
If selected, the actor will change the movement direction when colliding.
If unselected, the actor will try to keep on moving in the current direction.
boolean.name: _ChangeDirectiononCollision

snippet.desc: Attach to an actor to make it die when it collides with a specific actor type.
snippet.description: Attach to an actor to make it die when it collides with a specific actor type.
snippet.name: Die On Collision With Actor Type

actortype.desc: When the actor collides with an actor, it will die if the other actor is of this type.
actortype.name: _ActorType

snippet.desc: The Health Manager will track the Actor's current health, as well as provide blocks for healing and damaging the Actor. It can also send messages to other behaviors to allow for a wide range of functionality.
snippet.description: The Health Manager will track the Actor's current health, as well as provide blocks for healing and damaging the Actor. It can also send messages to other behaviors to allow for a wide range of functionality.
snippet.name: Health Manager

number.desc: Amount of health to start with.
number.name: _StartingHealth

number.desc: Maximum amount of health.
number.name: _MaximumHealth

number.desc: HIDDEN - Tracks the current amount of health.
number.name: _CurrentHealth

text.desc: Send this message to all behaviors when the Actor is healed by any amount. Remove value to prevent a message from being sent.
text.name: _HealedMessage

text.desc: Send this message to all behaviors when the Actor is damaged by any amount. Remove the value to prevent a message from being sent.
text.name: _DamagedMessage

text.desc:
What should we do when the health reaches zero?
1. Kill Actor
2. Do Nothing
text.name: _ZeroHealthAction

number.desc: How long should the Actor become temporarily invincible after being damaged?
number.name: _DelayBetweenDamage

boolean.desc: Check this box if the Actor's health should persist (stay the same) from scene to scene.
boolean.name: _PersistentHealth

game-attribute.desc:
Note: This option is only used if the Persistent Health? box is checked.

Select a Game Attribute to track the health for this Actor. Make sure the Attribute starts with a value of 0 (zero). Do not use the same attribute for more than one Actor.
game-attribute.name: _HealthGameAttribute

text.desc: INTERNAL ATTRIBUTE: The name of the game attribute created within the behaviour.
text.name: _HealthIdentifier

sound.desc: Play this sound when the Actor is damaged.
sound.name: _DamageSound

sound.desc: Play this sound when the Actor is killed.
sound.name: _DeathSound

sound.desc: Play this sound when the Actor is healed.
sound.name: _HealSound

number.desc: Vertical offset of the newly spawned actor from the original Actor.
number.name: yOffset

number.desc: Horizontal offset of the newly spawned actor from the original Actor.
number.name: xOffset

boolean.desc: Should the actor spawn another actor on death? Useful for death effects such as explosions.
boolean.name: _SpawnActorOnDeath

number.desc: How long should the actor stay alive before disappearing? Leave at 0 to prevent the Actor from being removed.
number.name: lifespan

number.desc: Horizontal offset in pixels
number.name: _HealthBarXOffset

text.desc: Actor space (relative to upper left coordinate of Actor), or Screen Space (where 0,0 is upper left of screen)?
text.name: _DrawingLocation

number.desc: Vertical offset in pixels
number.name: _HealthBarYOffset

number.desc: How many pixels should the outline be? Set to 0 to prevent an outline from drawing.
number.name: _HealthBarOutlineSize

number.desc: In pixels
number.name: _HealthBarHeight

number.desc: In pixels
number.name: _HealthBarWidth

color.desc: Enter an outline colour that will display around the background of the health bar
color.name: _HealthBarOutlineColour

color.desc: Colour of the health bar when the health is over 50%.
color.name: _ColourOver50

color.desc: Colour of the health bar when the health is over 25%.
color.name: _ColourOver25

color.desc: Colour of the health bar when the health is over 75%.
color.name: _ColourOver75

boolean.desc: Whether a health bar should be drawn or not.
boolean.name: _DrawHealthBar

color.desc: Colour of the health bar when the health is under 25%.
color.name: _ColourUnder25

color.desc: Background colour of the health bar.
color.name: _HealthBarBackgroundColour

snippet.desc: Makes the actor move back and forth horizontally.
snippet.description: Makes the actor move back and forth horizontally.
snippet.name: Back and Forth Horizontally

number.desc: The distance the actor will be moving to the left.
number.name: _DistanceLeft

number.desc: The movement speed.
number.name: _Speed

number.desc: The direction in which the actor will be moving when created.
number.name: _InitialDirection

number.desc: The distance the actor will be moving to the right.
number.name: _DistanceRight

boolean.desc:
If selected, the actor will change the movement direction when colliding.
If unselected, the actor will try to keep on moving in the current direction.
boolean.name: _ChangeDirectiononCollision

snippet.desc: Switch scene when an actor enters a region.
snippet.description: Switch scene when an actor enters a region.
snippet.name: Switch Scene on Enter Region

region.desc: The region which will trigger the scene switch.
region.name: _Region

actor.desc: The actor that will trigger the scene switch when entering the region.
actor.name: _Actor

boolean.desc: If selected, only switch scene, when <var>Switch Control</var> is pressed, while the actor is within the region.
boolean.name: _OnlySwitchOnKeyPress

control.desc: The Control to trigger the scene switch if <var>Only Switch On Key Press</var> is selected.
control.name: _SwitchControl

number.desc: The time to transition out, in seconds, if one of the first six Transition Styles is used. Otherwise the time to transition out and in.
number.name: _OutTime

number.desc: The time to transition in, in seconds, if one of the first six Transition Styles is used. Otherwise it is ignored.
number.name: _InTime

text.desc: The style to use for the switch scene transition.
text.dropdown: Fade=Fade Blinds=Blinds Bubbles=Bubbles Spotlight=Spotlight Blur=Blur Box=Box Crossfade=Crossfade Slide Up=Slide Up Slide Down=Slide Down Slide Left=Slide Left Slide Right=Slide Right
text.name: _TransitionStyle

snippet.desc: A button to switch to a different scene.
snippet.description: A button to switch to a different scene.
snippet.name: Switch Scene Button

animation.desc: Animation for the button in an unpressed state.
animation.name: _NormalAnimation

animation.desc: Animation for the button in an pressed-down state.
animation.name: _PressedAnimation

animation.desc: Animation for the button in a focused state. Not used in mobile games.
animation.name: _HoverAnimation

number.desc: The time to transition out, in seconds, if one of the first six Transition Styles is used. Otherwise the time to transition out and in.
number.name: _OutTime

number.desc: The time to transition in, in seconds, if one of the first six Transition Styles is used. Otherwise it is ignored.
number.name: _InTime

text.desc: The style to use for the switch scene transition.
text.dropdown: Fade=Fade Blinds=Blinds Bubbles=Bubbles Spotlight=Spotlight Blur=Blur Box=Box Crossfade=Crossfade Slide Up=Slide Up Slide Down=Slide Down Slide Left=Slide Left Slide Right=Slide Right
text.name: _TransitionStyle

snippet.desc: A button to pause/unpause the game.
snippet.description: A button to pause/unpause the game.
snippet.name: Pause Button

animation.desc: Animation for the button in an unpressed state.
animation.name: _NormalAnimation

animation.desc: Animation for the button in an pressed-down state.
animation.name: _PressedAnimation

animation.desc: Animation for the button in a focused state. Not used in mobile games.
animation.name: _HoverAnimation

animation.desc: Animation for the activated button in an unpressed state.
animation.name: _ActivatedNormalAnimation

animation.desc: Animation for the activated button in an pressed-down state.
animation.name: _ActivatedPressedAnimation

animation.desc: Animation for the activated button in a focused state. Not used in mobile games.
animation.name: _ActivatedHoverAnimation

snippet.desc: Attach to an actor to make it die when it collides with something.
snippet.description: Attach to an actor to make it die when it collides with something.
snippet.name: Die On Collision

snippet.desc: Spawn an explosion and fragments when the actor dies.
snippet.description: Spawn an explosion and fragments when the actor dies.
snippet.name: Explode On Death

number.desc: The maximum speed at which the fragments fly away.
number.name: _MaximumSpeed

number.desc: The number of fragments to create.
number.name: _NumberofFragments

actortype.desc:
The actor type of the fragments to create.
Make sure the actor type of the fragments doesn't collide with this actor.
actortype.name: _FragmentActorType

number.desc: The minimum speed at which the fragments fly away.
number.name: _MinimumSpeed

number.desc: The maximum turning speed for the fragments.
number.name: _MaximumTurningSpeed

number.desc: An offset in the direction of movement at which the fragments will be created.
number.name: _Offset

actortype.desc:
The actor type of the explosion to create.
Make sure the actor type of the explosion doesn't collide with this actor.
actortype.name: _ExplosionActorType

snippet.desc: Attach to an actor to make it die when it collides with an actor of a specific collision group.
snippet.description: Attach to an actor to make it die when it collides with an actor of a specific collision group.
snippet.name: Die On Collision With Group

actorgroup.desc: When the actor collides with an actor, it will die if the other actor is of from this group.
actorgroup.name: _Group

snippet.desc: Attach this behaviour to an actor to have it fade out after the specified time and over a specified duration
snippet.description: Attach this behaviour to an actor to have it fade out after the specified time and over a specified duration
snippet.name: Fade After Time

number.desc: The amount of time, in seconds, over which to fade out.
number.name: _FadeTime

number.desc: The amount of time, in seconds after which the actor should start fading.
number.name: _TimetoFadeAfter

boolean.desc: An INTERNAL attribute to determine whether or not the actor is already fading.
boolean.name: _Fading

boolean.desc: If selected, the actor is killed after fading out.
boolean.name: _KillAfterFade

snippet.desc: Attach to an actor to make it die after the given amount of time.
snippet.description: Attach to an actor to make it die after the given amount of time.
snippet.name: Die After Time

number.desc: The amount of time, in seconds, that the actor should wait before it dies.
number.name: _Time

snippet.desc: Switch scene when the user clicks or touches the screen.
snippet.description: Switch scene when the user clicks or touches the screen.
snippet.name: Switch Scene on Click or Touch

number.desc: The time to transition out, in seconds, if one of the first six Transition Styles is used. Otherwise the time to transition out and in.
number.name: _OutTime

number.desc: The time to transition in, in seconds, if one of the first six Transition Styles is used. Otherwise it is ignored.
number.name: _InTime

text.desc: The style to use for the switch scene transition.
text.dropdown: Fade=Fade Blinds=Blinds Bubbles=Bubbles Spotlight=Spotlight Blur=Blur Box=Box Crossfade=Crossfade Slide Up=Slide Up Slide Down=Slide Down Slide Left=Slide Left Slide Right=Slide Right
text.name: _TransitionStyle
